title: Adara's Apostasy
description: SHE FOUND A SEX POSITIVE RELIGION - WAS IT A CAUSE FOR CELEBRATION OR CONDEMNATION?The city of Stallbrook is known for its atmosphere of sexual freedom, not only because of the growing Free Spirit community there, but the police chief’s enlightened policies towards prostitution. Adara Khan has been sent there to research those policies, funded by a prominent heiress-activist determined to shut the system down. But as Adara delves into this further, the facts she discovers bring her into conflict with her allegiances and beliefs. Then there’s her own erotic explorations, complicated further when she hooks up with the girlfriend of her ex-boyfriend. What will happen when her benefactor reads her final report? And will she, in pursuing her carnal desires, find a way to reconcile past and present?
author: Rikki de la Vega
